archimate:Capability.name: Message Management
archimate:Capability.documentation: Ability to define, craft, frame, vet, disseminate, and track a verbal, written, recorded, or digitally represented communication, including missives, notifications, alerts, and other internally or externally targeted communiqué about the organization's mission, products, plans, activities, and other focal points.

properties.value: Ability to define, craft, frame, vet, disseminate, and track a verbal, written, recorded, or digitally represented communication, including missives, notifications, alerts, and other internally or externally targeted communiqué about the organization's mission, products, plans, activities, and other focal points.
